summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 11.5°C) and outside temperature (down 11.3°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 11%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 12235 lux) and cloud levels (up 344 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 16663 lux), the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (up 232 m), and outside humidity (down 6%) when compared to today.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 425m and a peak of 1526m, averaging 608.9m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; chilly temperatures are forecasted. Also, the atmosphere will feel parched and dry and mostly calm with light air movement. Possible light showers, the sky will be mostly cloudy (or even foggy) with low clouds, and it’s dim outside. Weather patterns to stay the same.
